Posts.Content: Dec 5, 2007 06:27AM jel1575 wrote: hi sam .. you keep up your positive attitude ... it will keep you going .. this is my second go round ... now have recurrance of b.c. stage IV, spots in liver, lung and lymph nodes in throat .... been undergoing agressive treatments for 13 months straight now ... comes back before it's even gone ... just keep your head up and enjoy your life ... be sure to let your dr. know of side effects ... quality of life is important
Posts.Title: 23 yrs. old - Stage IV - advice? Samantha17 jel1575
